name: It's My Lucky Day! (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
When you activate an effect that would make you roll a six-sided die (or dice) or flip a coin(s), you can pay 1000 LP to decide the result of 1 die or coin.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
